title: Literature Review Education for Understanding MOOC Quality Standards

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and basic scientific literacy
context.additional_context: Conducting real-time interactive and discussion-centered education in a smartphone-enabled learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four quality dimensions of MOOCs (pedagogical, organizational, technical, and social).
Learners can analyze MOOC quality standard evaluation frameworks through a literature review.
Learners can propose strategies for applying quality standards when designing science-related MOOCs.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
